description:
Climate campaigners should be thinking about the likely headlines coming out of the important European Parliament elections taking place from June 6-9. The Parliament passes EU legislation alongside the Council of Ministers (representing EU Member State governments) following formulation by the European Commission in the EU’s tripartite rule-making system. The latest poll of polls by […]

The post Climate Campaigners Must Understand the Implications of June’s Critical European Parliamentary Elections appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Climate Campaigners Must Understand the Implications of June’s Critical European Parliamentary Elections
